EmailTemplate.subject: Everyday office essentials delivered to your doorstep
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I hope you’re well and staying safe.
As many people continue to work from home, having to go out to get everyday office essentials isn’t ideal. To help you stay safe and productive in these challenging times, we’re now delivering right to your doorstep.
To get orders delivered to your home address, please follow the video or step by step instructions below.
Click here to watch the video <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/rs/720-MXC-641/images/Enter%20an Alternate Delivery Address - EN.mp4]]>
How to set up an alternate address
- Sign in to your Grand & Toy account - Add products to your cart - Go to the checkout page and select ‘New Alternate Address’ option - Enter your home address in the fields provided - Click the 'Apply' button - Checkout page will refresh to show the new address. Proceed with payment and submit the order as usual
If you have any questions or would like to chat, please feel free to reach out.
Best Regards,
Ed Jackson Government Account Manager, Public Sector
We have the business solutions to help you operate in the new normal.
If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences.
200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON, L4L 9C7
